title: 'Amazing product'
body: Very nice product for the given price but its not scratch proof as I am writing this review after using the product. And I see a lot of reviews about difficulty in opening the bag and says that key is not provided. But this bag doesn't come with the key all you need to do is set the code to 000 and press the side button to unlock. I am happy with the purchase and love to buy another one.

title: 'TSA Lock unlocking'
body: 'I have read the reviews about this product and found that most of the reviewers were struggling to open the lock. I suggest you all to search "how to open TSA lock of new American tourist". It\'s pretty simple actually. All the counter needs to be zero and the just slide key hole tab towards the counter and it will open.'

title: Please don't buy this
body: I had purchased the product on 16th of May and today I had my trip from Jaipur to guwahati. I was trying to set the password for the bag . But the password was not changed and also the bag got locked automatically. All of my clothes were inside the bag and I had my flight today . Because of this lock issue and also because my clothes were inside I had to carry that bag to Assam and then I had to make it open from dealer . Worst experience. Please don't buy it . I will talk to the customer support and will try if they could refund me back the amount and take that defective product with them because it is completely useless .  PLEASE GUYS . DONT BUY IT . I TALKED TO THE AUTHORISED DEALER OF AMERICAN TOURISTER AND HE TOLD ME THAT THERE WAS A DEFECT IN THE LOCK .

title: Doesn't have packing strap which holds cloths in top compartment
body: The product doesnot have packing strap in the top compartment. Normally, the packing strap should be in both the compartment so tht clothes don't slip down to bottom. I don't know if this situation is with my bag which i received or with all AT trolley bags.
